segments.text: This chaotic kitchen is almost too much to bear; I wish I could help somehow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is blissfully unaware, and part of me envies her calmness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But there’s a ticking time bomb beneath her feet with that overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy’s hand diving into the cookie jar, and it’s a comical sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, I can’t shake the anger bubbling inside me at their recklessness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s anticipation is sweet, but it feels wrong in this context.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shake the woman and point out the mess, but I remain silent.
segments.speaker: PAR
